alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 2:26PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow will impact portions North-Central Montana through 300 PM MST... At 223 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking moderate to heavy snow along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of Shelby to 7 miles northwest of Highwood. Movement was east northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snow and visibility as low as a half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Havre, Shelby, Fort Benton, Chester, Big Sandy, Parker School, Beaver Creek, Lothair, Joplin, The Knees, Azure, Inverness, Agency, St. Pierre, Black Eagle, Gildford, Sangrey, Boneau and Box Elder. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
